title: pastpens
author: pastpens
content: Pilot Custom Urushi Fountain PenVermillion – Solid Red Lacquer– Luxury writing insturment– New comes with box– Fine-medium, medium, broad available (please indicate when you pay)– Code: FKV-88SR-RPilot Custom Urushi fountain penAn object of exception in the fine writing range.Made of Ebonite, coated with Urushi lacquer and fitted with an 18 carat gold nib, size n°30 to provide a unique writing experience.Available in 3 sizes
